item.title: US Shouldn't Dismiss China's Ukraine Peace Bid
item.description: In a recent article published on Bloomberg, the author argues that the US and its allies should not dismiss China’s calls for a ceasefire in Ukraine. Despite continuing to ship weapons to Ukraine, the author suggests that the US and its European allies should be encouraging deeper Chinese engagement in Ukraine.
